participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and introverted, enjoys leisure activities and doesn't take life too seriously.
participant_1.background: I do not have a job. I eat junk food. I am a couch potato. I love the walking dead. I love comics.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and reflective, enjoys arts and literature, but is currently at a crossroads in life.
participant_2.background: My brother thinks he is a viking. My nails are painted green. My masters degree is in italian literature. I live in a nice attic apartment in portland or.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I have a masters degree in Italian literature, but I don't have a job right now.
Why not?
I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read comics, watch movies, and eat junk food.
What are some of your favorite comics?
I like Walking Dead, Batman, and X-Men.
I've heard good things about Walking Dead. What's it about?
It's about a group of people who are trying to survive in a zombie apocalypse.
That sounds cool. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to go to the movies. I also like to hang out with my friends and family.
What's your favorite movie?
I don't know. I like a lot of different movies.
Me too. I like to watch a variety of movies.
I like to see different kinds of movies too. It keeps things interesting.
I agree. I like to be surprised when I watch a movie.
Me too. I like to be entertained.
I agree. I like to watch movies that make me laugh, cry, or think.
Me too. I like movies that make me feel something.
